message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really be valuable for you. I'm willing to let it go for $9,500. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
I understand your position, Bob.  However, this product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm already offering a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $9,250?
I've given this some thought, Alice. While I understand the quality of the product, I believe I can secure a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $9,100 for the product. This is my final offer.
